sentence.Network_en: Conclusion: Walking speed might be increased by AFO in hemiplegic patients.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论: 踝足矫形器可以显著提高偏瘫患者的步行速度.

sentence.Network_en: Photo two : sitting next Gong Jinghong is her uncle, Gong Xiyan. Gong Xiyan is a hemiplegic.

sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 评价早期关节负重对脑卒中偏瘫患者运动功能的影响.
